roleset.name: fear, anxiety

role.descr: fearful of or about; misgiving; cause

roleset.note: Based on Sharp data. No Comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie.

example.name: With the cause only - petallar apprehension tests look for anxiety in a patient due to the movement of the patella
example.text: No patellar apprehension, with smooth tracking
